title: Did JFK Jr. write in 1999 that Trump would be "an unstoppable force for absolute justice "?
subtitle: Whatever John F. Kennedy Jr. might have thought of Donald Trump, he probably wouldn't have described anyone as "an unstoppable force for absolute justice."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In 1999, John Kennedy Jr. wrote that Donald Trump would be "an unstoppable force for final justice."
